full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 782 Filed 01/15/25 Page 20 of 158 20 LBAAMAX1ps Rocchio - Direct qualifications? A. It does, although it doesn't reflect my recent promotion at Brown from clinical instructor to clinical assistant professor. MS. POMERANTZ: Your Honor, the government would offer Government Exhibit 1. THE COURT: No objection? MR. PAGLIUCA: No objection for purposes of this hearing, your Honor. THE COURT: OK. For the purposes of this hearing, Government Exhibit 1 is admitted. Thank you. (Government's Exhibit 1 received in evidence) Q. Turning to page 4, what is listed there? A. Publications and professional presentations. Q. Can you summarize the subject of some of your published work. A. My published work generally deals in some way with traumatic stress, ethics, and professional practice issues. So a recent article was looking at the forensic assessment of individuals who have experienced complex trauma, childhood trauma, severe and repeated childhood trauma. I've also written issues related to ethics as part of a public service for education of junior members in the newsletter for the Rhode Island Psychological Association. Q. Have you had any public articles published in a peer-reviewed journal? SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300

Publications and professional presentations. Q. Can you summarize the subject of some of your published work. A. My published work generally deals in some way with traumatic stress, ethics, and professional practice issues. So a recent article was looking at the forensic assessment of individuals who have experienced complex trauma, childhood trauma, severe and repeated childhood trauma. I've also written issues related to ethics as part of a public service for education of junior members in the newsletter for the Rhode Island Psychological Association. Q.
